Description: Welcome to O’Learys where we combine the inviting atmosphere inspired by Boston’s unique bar culture with a modern twist on entertainment and dining. Our restaurants are relaxed meeting places that offer a unique blend of sports American food and activities for everyone. Whether you're a sports fan a food lover or just looking for something fun to do O’Learys has something for everyone.

We are within walking distance from the city center featuring an à la carte restaurant a bar and playful spaces with various activities. Here you can gather family friends and colleagues for a break from everyday life. We help you plan birthdays corporate events bachelorette and bachelor parties.

We are a small family-run business that always strives to give you the best possible bowling experience. For us it’s important that everyone who visits feels welcome and our staff is happy to help you find the right shoes or give tips on how to beat your personal best. Our bowling alley consists of two sections: the main hall with ten lanes and the VIP area with four more secluded lanes making us Uppsala’s most authentic bowling venue. We offer bowling and dining packages for adults as well as birthday party packages for kids. Check out the menu above to find the option that suits you best. Got any questions? Don’t hesitate to give us a call—we’ll sort it out! We have a kitchen and bar which means no outside food or drinks are allowed in the hall. All our prices apply until further notice. Welcome home to us!
Uppsala’s largest bowling conference and event venue! Drop by for a walk-in game or pre-book your session by calling us at +46 70-314 81 35 or booking online. A warm welcome!

Our restaurants are relaxed meeting places that offer a unique blend of sports American food and activities for everyone. Whether you're a sports fan a food lover or just looking for something fun to do O’Learys has something for everyone.
Where the restaurant Brasseriet blends with a sports bar and fun activities all under one roof. Uppsala’s go-to spot to bring family friends or colleagues for a complete experience. Welcome to us!

At our place the music is always on and the atmosphere? It’s always at its peak! Drop by for a relaxed after-work hangout with colleagues or friends. Challenge each other in boules shuffleboard darts or ping pong to get the energy going while we serve you cold beer fine wine and tasty bites. Our amazing DJs deliver the best music and don’t forget to check our event calendar so you don’t miss out when we host live music. Simply put it’s impossible to have a boring after-work at Botanika!
